author: JEGBSTEDS
title: Excellent Customer Service
text: I stay at this hotel nearly every week for business purposes and the Customer Service is in most cases superb and exceeds expectations. On occasion there's a blip in front of house, but the vast majority of times, Reception staff are warm, welcoming, courteous and attentive. Although the Premier Inn is a 'budget hotel' this one on occasion has room rates that exceed my budget but its convenience to work generally outweighs this. The rooms are always clean and in general problems (of which there are few) are dealt with promptly.
